text: MN+ is an Indian English Movie channel which is part of the Times Network. It was launched on 29 Jun 2015. The channel is owned by the Bennett, Coleman and Co. Ltd. ==See also== * Movies Now * Romedy Now ==References== ==External links== Category:Movie channels in India Category:Television channels and stations established in 2015 Category:English-language television stations in India Category:Television channels of The Times Group Category:2015 establishments in India
title: MN+
